item.title: Back To Sorting
item.description: Not the algorithmic kind, the real kind. The kind of sorting that was around long before even the first computer. Back then, perhaps I had some coins. Coins used to be a popular way to facilitate exchanges. So there we were back when this ancient computer was built. But we didn’t care about Â the computer. I had coins, you had beans, lets talk and make an exchange. Being competitive, I wanted as many of your beans for as few of my coins as possible. And thats where sorting comes in.
